# Region endpoint

FTS_URL: `FTS_URL=https://fts.podaac.earthdata.nasa.gov/v1/region`

The region endpoint queries geospatial river data from the [USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset](https://www.usgs.gov/national-hydrography/watershed-boundary-dataset).

Please see [User Guide: Responses](/user-guide/responses) for more information on the response data common to all requests that gets returned.

## region (partial query)

Example URL: `https://fts.podaac.earthdata.nasa.gov/v1/region/California`

Python requests library example:

```python
region = 'California'
query_url = f'{FTS_URL}/region/{region}'
response = requests.get(query_url)
```

By default the FTS query will perform a partial query, see below for how to create an "exact" query.

The region response returns geospatial data for the USGS HUC identifier region in the `results` attribute. This data includes a bounding box, convex hull polygon, and Visvalingam Polygon. Sample response:


## region (exact query)

You can include a request parameter `exact=true` so that FTS performs a search for exactly the string youâ€™ve entered.

Example URL: `https://fts.podaac.earthdata.nasa.gov/v1/region/Woods%20Creek-Skykomish%20River?exact=true`

Python requests library example:

```python
region = 'Woods Creek-Skykomish River'
query_url = f'{FTS_URL}/region/{region}'
params={'exact': 'true'}
response = requests.get(query_url, params=params
```
